name: PLANET D4RK
description:
Dash and slash through a challenging platformer!

This game takes heavy inspirations from games like Celeste and Katana Zero. While the game definitely wears its inspirations on its sleeve, I'm really proud of some of the later mechanics and level designs I came up with. I hope you enjoy it!

Other controls

XBOX and PS4 controller are both supported in addition to the above keyboard controls. If you plug in a controller and press a button, you should see the control prompts at the title screen change to match an XBOX controller.

Options
  • Hold R - Restart the current level 
  • Hold T - Return to title screen
  • Hold K - Skip cutscene

Also if you run into any issues with the web version, please leave a comment and if you can, try the downloadable version. I recommend using Chrome if you plan to play the web version, though Firefox should work fine as well. Thanks!

If you enjoyed the soundtrack, feel free to check out my soundcloud!

My speedrun PB is 5:17.399, so if you want to speedrun this game, let me know if you beat my time!
